protocol.text: The data were analyzed with the GeneSpring GX Software Suite using GC-RMA normalization ID_REF =  VALUE = LOG2 GC-RMA normalized values

Plants were grown on soil in long day (18 hour) light at 23C. Total RNA was extracted from unopened flower buds using Trizol reagent. Total RNA was further purified using a Qiagen MinElute RNA cleanup kit.
Arrays were scanned with Affymetrix GeneChip(r) Scanner 7G according to standard Affymetrix protocols.

Total RNA were assessed for quality with Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer and Nanodrop 8000 spectrophotometer. Hybridization targets were prepared with MessageAmp Premier RNA Amplification Kit (Applied Biosystems/Ambion, Austin, TX) from total RNA.

Hybridization was performed to ATH1 arrays in Affymetrix GeneChip(r) hybridization oven 645 and washed in Affymetrix GeneChip(r) Fluidics Station 450 according to standard Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization and Wash protocols.
